title: Pan-fried chicken with orange and rosemary sauce
ingredients: ['2 tsp olive oil', '4 chicken breast fillets, about 150g each', '2 oranges', '2 shallots, finely chopped', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '1 tbsp tangy orange marmalade', '1 tsp chopped fresh rosemary or 1/2 tsp dried', '1 tsp cornflour', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'sprigs of fresh rosemary to garnish']
